issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Vectorization : Insert in bucketed table is broken with vectorization

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Gopal pointed out that native Vectorization of ReduceSink is missing the empty key case.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Specialize ReduceSink empty key case

comments.body:
Unable to attach the actual patch due to infrastructure issue https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-14051

So, attached compressed version of the patch instead.

NOTE: Patch #01 contains the changes for https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-16541, too.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12865709/HIVE-16557.01.patch
